早.definition: early; morning; Good morning!; long ago; prematurely

早C晚A.definition: (skincare regimen) Vitamin C in the morning, Vitamin A in the evening (original meaning); (jocular) coffee in the morning, alcohol in the evening

早出晚歸.definition: to leave early and return late (idiom)

早場.definition: morning show (at a theater or cinema); matinee

早孕.definition: teenage pregnancy; early stage of pregnancy

早已.definition: for a long time; long since; (dialect) in the past

早年.definition: many years ago; in the past; in one's early years

早戀.definition: to be in love when one is too young; puppy love

早播.definition: to plant early; to sow seeds in early spring

早操.definition: morning exercises (physical exercises commonly performed en masse at schools and workplaces in East Asian countries)

早教.definition: early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])

早日.definition: soon; at an early date; the early days; the past

早日康復.definition: to recover health quickly; Get well soon!

早早兒.definition: (coll.) as soon as possible; as early as one can

早早班.definition: preschool group for kids aged three or less; (Tw) work shift starting around daybreak

早晚.definition: morning and evening; (in reference to sth that is bound to happen) sooner or later; one of these days; (coll.) (this, or that) point of time; (dialect) at some time in the future

早晨.definition: early morning; CL:個|个[ge4]; also pr. [zao3chen5]

早期.definition: early period; early phase; early stage

早死.definition: to die while still relatively young; to have been dead (for some years)

早死早超生.definition: to end one's suffering by dying quickly and being reincarnated; (fig.) to get it over with

早班兒.definition: erhua variant of 早班[zao3 ban1]

早生貴子.definition: give birth to a son soon (propitiatory compliment to newlyweds)

早睡早起.definition: early to bed, early to rise; to keep early hours

早知今日何必當初.pinyin: zao3 zhi1 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1
早知今日何必當初.definition: if I (you, she, he...) had known it would come to this, I (you, she, he...) would not have acted thus (idiom); to regret vainly one's past behavior

早稻.definition: early season rice; rice at transplanting or still unripe

早課.definition: matins; morning service (in the Catholic Church); morning chorus (of birds)

早退.definition: to leave early (before the stipulated finishing time); to retire early (from one's job)
